explanation: Author, Editor, Illustrator, and Publisher are all roles directly involved in the creation, refinement, or dissemination of a book. A Bookworm is an avid reader, consuming books rather than producing them.

category: Key Figures of the American Civil Rights Movement
explanation: Martin Luther King Jr., Rosa Parks, Malcolm X, and John F. Kennedy were all prominent figures associated with the American Civil Rights Movement. Nelson Mandela was a central figure in the anti-apartheid movement in South Africa.

A Dozen (12), Pair (2), Score (20), and Gross (144) are all specific numerical quantities used to count items. A Decade, however, is a period of 10 years, referring to a quantity of time rather than items.
